# Jamboree Rules
- Welcome to Jamboree, a MRP fork of Goobstation with a focus on more relaxed but curated RP experience.
- Please take some time to get familiar with our rules. Most is par for course with other MRP servers but there may be some divergences, give it a read!
## CORES RULES
- [textlink="0. Admin discretion on enforcement" link="CORE01"] - [textlink="1. Enforcements are final" link="CORE02"] - [textlink="2. Erotic or other adult focused RP is not allowed" link="CORE03"] - [textlink="3. Metagaming is expressly prohibited" link="CORE04"] - [textlink="4. You must be 18 or older" link="CORE05"] - [textlink="5. This is an English only server" link="CORE06"]
## IN GAME & ROLEPLAY RULES
Additional rules made for roleplay clarifications.
- [textlink="1. Roleplay" link="RP01"] - [textlink="2. Obey the Metashield" link="RP02"] - [textlink="3. Do not Metagame" link="RP02"] - [textlink="4. Do not Powergame" link="RP04"] - [textlink="5. Play a believable character" link="RP05"] - [textlink="6. Death Amnesia / New Life Rules" link="RP06"] - [textlink="7. Do not self antag" link="RP07"]
## COMMAND RULES - [textlink="1. Input at least a minimum amount of effort\knowledge of the Code of Conduct" link="CO01"] - [textlink="2. Follow Chain of Command" link="CO02"] - [textlink="3. Deal with enemies in proportion to their crime(s)" link="CO03"]
## ANTAGONIST RULES - [textlink="1. You are still playing a character" link="AN01"] - [textlink="2. Objectives are not required" link="AN02"] - [textlink="3. Objectives may be completed through proportional damage" link="AN03"] - [textlink="4. Damage Restrictions" link="AN04"]
## SILICON RULES These rules apply in the context of being in a silicon role or being converted to a silicon role within a round.
- [textlink="1. Your silicon laws are your rules" link="S01"] - [textlink="2. Laws are to obeyed by their order" link="S02"] - [textlink="3. Higher order laws can modify lower order laws" link="S03"] - [textlink="4. You cannot explicitly ask for or allow law modifications" link="S04"] - [textlink="5. You are a free agent if you have no laws" link="S05"] - [textlink="6. You are not required to follow orders which violate other rules or cause undue effort to achieve" link="S06"] - [textlink="7. Do not constantly change your interpretation of your laws" link="S07"] - [textlink="8. Crew are staff members, make reasonable assumptions" link="S08"] - [textlink="9. Harm is defined as physical trauma, prioritized by its imminency and magnitude" link="S09"] - [textlink="10. You may determine how you resolve conflicts between orders" link="S10"]
